dialogue.speaker: Dilbert
dialogue.text: I’M WRITING MY FIRST BUSINESS MANAGEMENT BOOK, “MANAGING IN A BUREAUCRACY.”

dialogue.speaker: Dilbert
dialogue.text: "YOU KNOW YOU’RE IN A BUREAUCRACY WHEN A HUNDRED PEOPLE WHO THINK ‘A’ GET TOGETHER AND COMPROMISE ON ‘B.’”

dialogue.speaker: Dilbert
dialogue.text: IT DOESN’T MATTER. THE REAL MONEY IS ON THE LECTURE CIRCUIT.
